00069 #ifndef GL_TYPES_INCLUDED
00070 #define GL_TYPES_INCLUDED
00071 
00072 // #if defined( _SDL_H )
00073         #include "SDL_types.h"
00074 
00075         typedef Uint8                   U8;
00076         typedef Sint8               S8;
00077         typedef Uint16                  U16;
00078         typedef Sint16                  S16;
00079         typedef Uint32                  U32;
00080         typedef Sint32                  S32;
00081 
00082         #ifdef SDL_HAS_64BIT_TYPE
00083                 typedef SDL_HAS_64BIT_TYPE                              S64;
00084                 typedef unsigned SDL_HAS_64BIT_TYPE             U64;
00085         #else
00086                 #error No 64-bit integer.
00087         #endif
00088 
00089 // #elif defined ( GL_INT64 )
00090 // 
00091 //      typedef unsigned char   U8;
00092 //      typedef signed char         S8;
00093 //      typedef unsigned short  U16;
00094 //      typedef signed short    S16;
00095 //      typedef unsigned int    U32;
00096 //      typedef signed int              S32;
00097 // 
00098 //      typedef GL_INT64                        S64;
00099 //      typedef unsigned GL_INT64       U64;
00100 // 
00101 // #else
00102 //      // NOTE: This usually means that the SDL header was not 
00103 //      //               included before a Kyra header, or that the standard
00104 //      //               types were not defined.
00105 //      #error Need to get type data for this system.
00106 // #endif
00107 
00108 
00109 #endif
